plot: One morning Louise finds out that her best friend's mother is dead. She is going to spend the afternoon with her without mentioning anything about it.
title: Rien à dire
plot_es: One morning Louise finds out that her best friend's mother is dead. She is going to spend the afternoon with her without mentioning anything about it.
plot_en: One morning Louise finds out that her best friend's mother is dead. She is going to spend the afternoon with her without mentioning anything about it.
